Name: Dragon Dive
Desc:
[Mir Skill] Mir body-slams into enemies in front of Evan, and then flaps his wings, sending forth a shock wave. Dragon Dive does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
Mir's Skills and the Fusion Skills aren't affected by ASPD Bonus effects.
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 4th job skill Dragon Breath.
